title: DevOps Engineer
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role - DevOps Engineer

You will be welcomed into our engineering department, which is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. To support the delivery process and stability of our products, we can also count on our Product Support team, QA team, and SRE team who, alongside our Product and People team, Director/Architect and VP Engineering, are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers.

Your mission

  • Automating provisioning processes of Kubernetes clusters as well as our microservices based software application Cognigy.AI
  • Monitoring product installations and our infrastructure to guarantee the stability of our SaaS product offerings
  • Helping our engineering teams to automate reoccurring procedures to increase efficiency and reduce costs
  • Providing guidance to other DevOps engineers
  • Holistic approach - As part of an agile development team, you will be involved in all phases of software engineering - from inception to coding, testing, delivery, and operation. You enable a high degree of automation on every level
  • Performance mindset - Your mission will be to increase productivity of development teams by focusing on the cross-functional aspects like observability, scalability, availability, maintainability, reliability, etc, while always keeping the customer in mind. In doing so, you will also be leading postmortems after major incidents.
  • Continuous learning - You are willing to continuously develop yourself, eager to share your knowledge and take over responsibility, and have fun doing so
  • Customer feedback - As part of the team you constantly seek out feedback from users while developing new features and always keep the code base deployable to production

Requirements

About you

  • Several years of experience in Kubernetes and running containers in production, including building Kubernetes clusters from the ground up
  • Being available in case of emergencies is not a problem for you
  • Experience in running distributed systems like databases
  • Good networking knowledge - Like VPC, Subnets, Internet Gateways
  • Multiple years of experience with CI/CD systems like Jenkins – you love to automate whenever you can
  • Experience with automation tools - Terraform, Helm and Flux
  • Excellent communication skills in English

Desirable skills and experiences

  • Knowledge in auto-scaling infrastructure by leveraging tools like the Horizontal Pod Autoscaler or the Cluster Autoscaler
  • You have used products like AWS EKS, Azure AKS or Google GKE – the managed Kubernetes services from leading cloud providers
  • You can use “the force” to proactively scale our infrastructure
  • You have expertise in coding with one or more of the following languages - Golang, Python, Ruby, JavaScript, Java or Perl.
  • You have also experience with cloud platforms (e.g. Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure).
  • You are familar with topics like Docker, Kubernetes, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, Postgres, Kafka, Jenkings, Gitlab
  • Basic knowledge of monitoring and experience with Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK-Stack or similar tools
  • Expertise around web security and networking
  • Your mindset - You have a systematic problem-solving approach, coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive.
  • You have experience in dealing with difficult situations and you can make, when necessary, decisions with a sense of urgency
  • Last but not least - You want to work in an international, dynamic and highly motivated team and want to contribute the development of Cognigy.AI

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

 

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

  • Multiple years of experience with CI/CD systems like Jenkins – you love to automate whenever you can
  • Experience with automation tools - Terraform, Helm and Flux

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

title: Engineering Manager
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role

Our engineering department is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. With strong collaboration from our Support, QA and SRE Teams you will be ensuring the delivery process and the stability of our products. 

With the backing from our Product and People Team, our Director/Architect and VP of Engineering we are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers. 

Engineering Manager

Job location - on-site in Düsseldorf or remote in Germany

Your challenge

  • Managing, mentoring and coaching a team of software engineers 
  • Provide resources to improve the engineers’ skills 
  • Goal setting and quarterly assessment of team members 
  • Training the team according to best practices, to ensure a high-quality product 
  • Work to remove obstacles blocking the engineers from achieving their objectives 
  • Setting up organization structures and processes for fast flow and scalability 
  • Facilitating the communication between engineering disciplines 
  • Together with the Product Owner and Tech Lead, define and drive initiatives for long term improvements within the team 
  • Human Resource Management related tasks, such as recruitment, remuneration, career planning, long-term vacation planning 

 

Requirements

About you

    • Previous experience leading and managing engineering teams 
    • Clear communication and conflict resolution skills 
    • Results oriented with a pragmatic mindset 
    • You thrive in dynamic environments and can effectively manage shifting priorities 
    • Able to communicate technical and non-technical directions 
    • Empathetic personality who believes in giving and receiving open feedback 
    • You know how to build a supportive and trusting environment within the team 
    • You are personable and enjoy interacting with people 

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - what we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Full-stack Software Engineer
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role

You will be welcomed into our engineering department, which is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. To support the delivery process and stability of our products, we can also count on our Product Support team, QA team, and SRE team who, alongside our Product and People team, Director/Architect and VP Engineering, are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers.

Your challenge

  • Develop and deliver software solutions that meet customer needs quickly and efficiently
  • Creating high-quality code with a well-structured and maintainable design
  • Keep our codebase tested and secure
  • Overseeing of our user interface
  • Profiling and benchmarking our codebase to identify bottlenecks
  • Ensure operational excellence through monitoring, logging, and e2e testing
  • Providing guidance to other developers and act as a mentor

Requirements

About you

  • Several years of experience in full-stack software development
  • Experience with containers and debugging containerized applications
  • Experience in using and working in a Linux-based environment
  • Experience building front-end applications with a similar tech stack to React.JS, Vue.JS, CSS in JS and state management libraries such as Redux
  • Experience building back-end applications with frameworks such as Node.JS or Ruby on Rails
  • You have a ‘feel for good design’ – padding and margin are not just CSS properties for you
  • Familiar with MongoDB or a similar NoSQL database. Experience with SQL is also appreciated
  • Familiar with Realtime communication protocols such as WebSocket or WebRTC
  • Experience with writing well-tested and high-quality code
  • Open to various programming languages and willing to learn continuously
  • Good communication skills and the ability to present new concepts to our management
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively

Sounds like you? Come and join us!

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Backend Engineer (Voice)
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role

You will be welcomed into our engineering department, which is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. To support the delivery process and stability of our products, we can also count on our Product Support team, QA team, and SRE team who, alongside our Product and People team, Director/Architect and VP Engineering, are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers.

Your challenge

  • Develop and deliver software solutions that meet customer needs quickly and efficiently 
  • Create the best-in-class software-, architecture- and code-design. Always searching for ways to improve the design and implementation. 
  • Keep our codebase tested and secure 
  • Profiling and benchmarking our codebase to identify bottlenecks 
  • Ensure operational excellence through monitoring, logging, and e2e testing 
  • Providing guidance to other engineers and act as a mentor 
  • You strive for operational excellence through monitoring, logging & tracing. You embrace a “you-build-it-you-run-it" mentality in the team and the wider organization. 
  • You proactively strive to improve processes, generate ideas & implement automations to make day-to-day tasks easier 

Requirements

About you 

  • At least 5 years of experience in backend software development. 
  • You’ve been deploying, running & monitoring containerized software products using Kubernetes for more than 2 years in production. 
  • You are expert with Node.JS/Typescript 
  • You have built software using real-time communication protocols like FreeSWITCH with audio, video, text and other forms of media 
  • You have experience with Speech-to-text/Text-to-speech APIs of different providers. 
  • You have experience with DBs like Postgresql, MySQL, MongoDB 
  • You are an expert in designing and improving automated tests. 
  • Open to various programming languages and willing to learn continuously 
  • You facilitate best in class communication skills in order to present new solutions, effectively communicate with the team and mentor less senior engineers. 
  • You can work independently & collaboratively in multiple codebases and deliver key features in highest quality 

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior AR Accountant
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time. 

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy: our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts: Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role: Senior AR Accountant
Location: Düsseldorf or remote (Germany)
Your responsibilities will include:  

  • Creation of & Issuing of Customer billings / invoices (from approved SO’s)  
  • Customer Communications relating to invoices / billings / collections
  • Customer corrections (billing schedules)
  • Generating customer invoices according to contracts, company policy & practices  
  • Reviewing customer contracts and orders for accuracy and adherence to policy,
  • Processing the AR accounts and incoming payments received, whilst maintaining accurate customer records
  • The onboarding of our Customers and the related vendor management software setup that some Customers require for the submission/receipt of our invoices
  • Reconciling the accounts receivable ledger in NetSuite, manages AR records
  • Handling day to day AR transactions, verify discrepancies, make corrections and resolve any Customer’ billing queries & requests
  • Facilitating on time payment of AR invoices due by handling our full dunning process
  • Generating & Maintenance of various department reports detailing accounts receivable status (on a monthly, weekly and adhoc basis)
  • Handles Billing schedules and Customer Billing & cash incoming forecasting


Growth Potential: 

At Cognigy we are committed to your professional growth. This role offers significant opportunities for career development, including access to ongoing training, and involvement in high-impact projects allowing you to showcase and advance your unique skills and experience. 

Requirements

About you

  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in accounts receivable or a similar role (Must have experience in the OTC process)
  • Ability to calculate, post & manage accounting records accurately – understands & applies accounting principles  
  • Experience with accounting software, such as Datev, SAP, MS Dynamics, Sage, or NetSuite
  • Experience with Revenue Recognition principles and practices
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel
  • Good organizational and time-management skills
  • Strong attention to detail and accuracy
  • Ability to prioritize tasks, & work independently in an organized manner
  • Excellent customer service, team, collaboration, and communication skills (both written ​and verbal) 
  • You have fluent German language skills and can communicate effectively in both German and English

Sounds like you? Come and join us!

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you
We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

    • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
    • Company Pension Scheme
    • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
    • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
    • Flexible working options
    • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
    • Global Employee Assistance Program
    • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
    • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
    • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
    • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Technical Support Specialist
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.


Your new role 

The Technical Support Specialist will be responsible for providing technical assistance and support to customers. They will diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues, identify and implement solutions, and document and record technical procedures. The Support Specialist will also be responsible for providing education and training to customers on the use of products and services. 

    • First point of contact for customer issues 
    • Properly escalate requests to the next level of support 
    • Tracking and routing issues to the appropriate parties 
    • Guiding the customer through the issue resolution process by applying excellent customer service skills and exceed customer expectations 
    • Ensure proper record keeping, documentation, and closure 
    • Working closely with developers to improve product’s functionality 
    • Retain and expand knowledge of procedures, products, and services in the Help Desk area 
    • Develop and maintain internal tools

Requirements

About you: 

  • 3+ years Proven work experience as a product support engineer or in a similar role 
  • Hands-on experience with Windows/Linux with a good understanding of computer systems, software and other technical products 
  • Strong knowledge of software development, databases, and system design 
  • Understanding of customer service best practices and policies 
  • Outgoing approachable person who can fit into a social team with excellent communication skills 
  • Demonstrate a can-do approach both mentality and in attitude 
  • Ability to provide step-by-step technical support, both written and verbal (ENG/GER) 
  • Strong analytical and troubleshooting abilities. 
  • Ability to analyze and troubleshoot technical issues effectively 
  • Experience with cloud-based technologies. 
  • Knowledge of basic programming languages 

 

Sounds like you? Come and join us! 

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time. 

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy: our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts:

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role: Senior Frontend Engineer
Job location: on-site in Düsseldorf or remote in Germany


You will be welcomed into our engineering department, which is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. With strong collaboration from our Support, QA and SRE Teams you will be ensuring the delivery process and the stability of our products. With the backing from our Product and People Team, our Director/Architect and VP of Engineering we are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers.

Your challenge:

  • Lead the development of responsive, interactive and scalable web applications using either Vue.js or React with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Collaborate with backend developers to create seamless and visually appealing user interfaces.
  • Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and optimize our applications for maximum scalability and speed.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices and industry standards.
  • Mentor and guide junior developers, providing code reviews and technical direction.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and integrate them into our development processes.
  • Debug and resolve technical issues, ensuring a smooth and reliable user experience.
  • Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.
  • Contribute to the continuous improvement of our development workflows and processes.

Requirements

About you

  • Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in frontend development, building single page applications
  • Proficiency in Vue.js or React, with a strong understanding of their ecosystems.
  • Expert knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript with experience in building responsive and accessible web applications.
  • Familiarity with state management libraries (e.g., Vuex, Redux) and modern frontend build tools (e.g., Vite, Webpack).
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and great attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
  • Experience with testing frameworks (e.g., Jest, Mocha) and end-to-end testing tools (e.g., Cypress, Selenium) is a plus.
  • Familiarity with backend technologies and APIs is a plus.
  • Open to various programming languages and willing to learn continuously
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively

Benefits

Life at Cognigy: what we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include:

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement: Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Channel Marketing Manager - US
description:
About Cognigy:

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time. 

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy: Our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts: Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.


Your new role: Channel Marketing Manager – US (Contractor)

Location: Plano, TX, United States
Potential Earnings: $120.000 to $135.000 OTE

As a Senior Channel Marketing Manager at Cognigy, you will work with strategic, tech, reseller and referral partners to expand marketing reach, boost brand awareness, and generate leads together. This role is responsible for overseeing day-to-day operations, partner event management, content development and channel sales. The ideal candidate will cultivate relationships and identify opportunities for pipeline growth to shape future channel marketing strategies. This role requires a highly detail-oriented, self-motivated doer with a proven ability to drive successful outcomes. The ideal candidate possesses a positive, make-it-happen attitude, thrives in a fast-paced environment and is eager to make a significant impact.

Note: This is NOT an affiliate partner marketing role.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Work with strategic, tech, reseller and referral partners to expand marketing reach, boost brand awareness, and generate leads together in the field and digitally.
  • Shape and execute a channel marketing strategy that reflects the joint partners business objectives; build and execute agreed-upon marketing plans start to finish.
  • Drive partner events, virtual and in-person, handling all event logistics, including booth strategy, registrations, agenda scheduling, staffing, giveaways and on-site production.
  • Plan out a regular cadence of communications for product launches, marketing activities and time sensitive updates.
  • Collaborate cross-departmentally to develop high-quality, multi-format joint marketing content such as case studies, blog content, and white papers.
  • Conduct post-event evaluations and ROI analyses, reporting results and recommendations to sales and marketing teams.

Requirements

About you

  • Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field
  • 5+ years of experience in channel marketing, field marketing or related roles
  • Strong understanding of channel sales, partner ecosystems, and go-to-market strategies
  • Proven experience in managing marketing budgets and executing marketing strategies
  • Strong event planning and management skills, with experience coordinating tradeshows, webinars, and other partner events
  • Proficiency in marketing analytics and data-driven decision-making
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams

Benefits

Life at Cognigy: What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include:

  • Attractive and performance-orientated salary
  • Group medical, prescription, dental and vision insurance
  • Life, AD&D and short-term disability insurance
  • 401(k)
  • PTO
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible and remote working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement: Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.he basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Account Executive - DACH
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is revolutionizing the customer service industry by harnessing the most cutting-edge AI technology on the market. Its award-winning solution Cognigy.AI, empowers businesses to deliver exceptional service that is instant, personalized, in any language and on any channel. Cognigy is shaping the future of customer service, creating AI Agents by perfectly combining Generative and Conversational AI to increase customer satisfaction and actively support employees in real-time.  

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our cutting-edge technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be leading the automation of conversations to make life easier for everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role - Senior Account Executive - DACH

Location - Germany

We're looking for an experienced Enterprise Account Executive to join our expanding DACH Sales team and help us revolutionize the industry. In this role, you'll collaborate with potential customers to learn about their needs and objectives, and determine how Cognigy can assist them.

Responsibilities

  • Acquiring new enterprise companies from all industries within the DACH region
  • Building and maintaining an effective pipeline by self-directed prospecting, as well as working with internal, Business Development Representative resources
  • Developing, maintaining and reviewing territory plans that outline how you will meet business goals
  • Running full sales cycles from account planning & targeted prospecting through discovery/qualification, contract negotiation & close
  • Taking a consultative, value-centric approach with senior executives to map value, develop effective business cases, build ROI models and drive Digital Transformation conversations
  • Coordinating responses to RFPs/RFIs
  • Taking a collaborative approach to working closely with various team members including BDRs, Presales support, Marketing, Product, Finance and Leadership
  • Representing Cognigy at trade fairs or events that are customary in the industry
  • Preparing, presenting and conducting demos, presentations and customer meetings
  • Using CRM effectively and consistently to track sales cycles/engagement

Growth Potential

At Cognigy we are committed to your professional growth. This role offers significant opportunities for career development, including access to ongoing training, and involvement in high-impact projects allowing you to showcase and advance your unique skills and experience.

Requirements

About you

  • You are an experienced Enterprise Sales Executive with a proven track record of success in selling SaaS within the wider Contact Center or Conversational AI environment
  • You have a hunter mentality and are passionate about winning and being part of an exciting company in a hyper-growth phase
  • You are confident navigating sales cycles with all management levels (particularly SVP/C-Level)
  • Organization and prioritizing are at the heart of everything you do and you are disciplined and function well in a remote environment
  • What is a salesperson without professional communication skills, and a customer-centric, personable demeanor?!
  • You can balance driving a sales cycle independently while leveraging internal resources
  • You are comfortable leveraging a partner channel to support the sales process
  • Fluent in German and English

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

 

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Project Manager - EMEA
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time.

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - Our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts - Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role - Senior Project Manager - EMEA

Location: Germany - Remote (must be based in Germany)

As a Senior Project Manager, you will be responsible for successfully delivering enterprise projects from initiation to completion. You will ensure alignment with the Statement of Work (SOW), manage project scope, timelines, and budgets, and exceed stakeholder expectations through effective project planning and execution. This role is pivotal in ensuring the seamless deployment of Cognigy’s Conversational AI solutions while maintaining transparency and fostering collaboration across all stakeholders.

Your responsibilities will include

  • Project Leadership: Plan, execute, and monitor projects from start to finish, ensuring adherence to the agreed-upon scope, timeline, and budget.
  • Scope Definition: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, deliverables, and comprehensive project plans with clear timelines and milestones.
  • Communication: Regularly update stakeholders, team members, and senior management on project goals, progress, and potential challenges.
  • Risk Management: Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks proactively, developing contingency plans to ensure project success.
  • Team Collaboration: Foster a collaborative environment among project team members by defining clear roles, responsibilities, and expectations.
  • Accountability Management: Track and manage action items, ensuring all parties deliver on their commitments and project goals are met.
  • Quality Assurance: Oversee project testing and ensure deliverables align with Cognigy’s quality standards.
  • Post-Project Evaluation: Conduct evaluations to capture lessons learned, applying improvements to future projects. 

Growth Potential

At Cognigy we are committed to your professional growth. This role offers significant opportunities for career development, including access to ongoing training, and involvement in high-impact projects allowing you to showcase and advance your unique skills and experience.

Requirements

About you

  • At least 5 years of proven experience in end-to-end project management, with a strong track record of successfully delivering enterprise projects on time and within budget.
  • Experience within professional services, consulting, or industries such as Contact Center operations and Conversational AI.
  • Solid understanding of project management principles, methodologies, and tools. Familiarity with APIs and SaaS solutions is advantageous.
  • Strong grasp of sales processes and business analysis, with the ability to align project goals with broader business objectives.
  • Exceptional ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously with keen attention to detail.
  • Proactive approach to identifying challenges and implementing innovative solutions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication abilities to build effective relationships with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Expertise in project management software and tools.

Benefits

Life at Cognigy -  What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include -

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including Udemy
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

 

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement

Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

  • Experience within professional services, consulting, or industries such as Contact Center operations and Conversational AI.
  • Solid understanding of project management principles, methodologies, and tools. Familiarity with APIs and SaaS solutions is advantageous.
  • Strong grasp of sales processes and business analysis, with the ability to align project goals with broader business objectives.
  • Exceptional ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously with keen attention to detail.
  • Proactive approach to identifying challenges and implementing innovative solutions.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication abilities to build effective relationships with stakeholders at all levels.
  • Expertise in project management software and tools.
benefits:
Life at Cognigy -  What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include -

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including Udemy
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

 

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement

Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: GTM Technical Enablement Manager
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time.

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy - Our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts - Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role - GTM Technical Enablement Manager

The GTM Technical Enablement Manager is responsible for designing and delivering high-impact technical training programs for Cognigy partners and internal teams (Cognigy Crew). This role will ensure that partners and employees gain the skills and confidence needed to implement and optimize AI-driven conversational experiences using Cognigy’s AI Agents.

You will focus on developing structured, scalable technical training (both live and on-demand) and certification programs, executing hands-on technical bootcamps, and driving measurable outcomes such as certification rates, time-to-competency, and training satisfaction scores.

Your responsibilities will include:

  • Technical Training Development: Design and deliver live and virtual technical training programs for partners and internal GTM teams.
  • On-Demand Learning Content: Create engaging video-based training modules for LMS platforms.
  • Certification Programs: Drive partner and employee certification rates through targeted workshops and assessments.
  • Bootcamps & Workshops: Deliver quarterly hands-on technical bootcamps.
  • Training Analytics: Measure and report on training effectiveness (completion rates, satisfaction scores, time-to-competency).
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Align with Sales, Product, and Partner teams to ensure training meets business needs.
  • Continuous Improvement: Gather feedback and iterate training content to address knowledge gaps.
  • Travel: Willingness to travel up to 25% for in-person training.

Growth Potential

At Cognigy we are committed to your professional growth. This role offers significant opportunities for career development, including access to ongoing training, and involvement in high-impact projects allowing you to showcase and advance your unique skills and experience.

Requirements

About you

Essential:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Education/Training, or a related field.
  • 3+ years of experience in technical enablement or solutions consulting in a SaaS or technology company.
  • Fluent in German and English (native or near-native proficiency).
  • Strong instructional and presentation skills (live and virtual).
  • Experience with LMS platforms, e-learning tools, and video editing for training content.
  • Ability to translate complex technical concepts into clear, actionable training materials.
  • Strong cross-functional collaboration skills.

Preferred:

  • Deep knowledge of conversational AI, automation, or customer experience platforms.
  • Experience in designing certification programs and technical bootcamps.

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include -

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including Udemy
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement

Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.

title: Senior Backend Engineer (NLU)
description:
About Cognigy

Cognigy is transforming the customer service industry with the most advanced AI Agent platform for enterprise contact centers. Its award-winning solution, Cognigy.AI, empowers enterprises to deliver instant, hyper-personalized, multilingual service on any channel. By integrating Generative and Conversational AI to create Agentic AI, Cognigy delivers AI Agents that redefine customer experiences, drive satisfaction, and support contact center employees in real-time. 

Our skilled #CognigyCrew are the people behind our leading technology and we are now looking for more talented people to join our global team.

Why you’ll love working at Cognigy: our promise to you

We empower our people to be successful as part of a diverse, passionate and respectful team who are proud to be enabling customer and employee service that is loved by everyone.

We do this by challenging each other to succeed and being enabled to do our best work. Encouraging and supporting growth is at the heart of our success, founded on a culture of mutual respect and trust – always! It’s no wonder that the values that inspire and drive our #CognigyCrew are our 4Ts:

Team, Trust, Transparency, Technology.

Your new role: Senior Backend Engineer (NLU)
Job location: on-site in Düsseldorf or remote in Germany


You will be welcomed into our engineering department, which is divided into cross-functional, verticalized development teams, who are focused on delivering continuous improvements, features and developing new products. With strong collaboration from our Support, QA and SRE Teams you will be ensuring the delivery process and the stability of our products. With the backing from our Product and People Team, our Director/Architect and VP of Engineering we are constantly looking to overcome new challenges, to innovate, and to ensure the success of our products and satisfaction of our customers.

Your challenge:

  • Develop and deliver software solutions that meet customer needs quickly and efficiently – you know how to apply the 80/20 rule.
  • Create high-quality, well-structured, and maintainable code.
  • Keep our codebase tested and secure.
  • Profile and benchmark our codebase to identify bottlenecks – you are interested in running regular benchmarks.
  • Ensure operational excellence through monitoring, logging, and end-to-end testing – you have a you-build-it-you-run-it mentality.
  • Provide guidance to other developers and act as a mentor for juniors.
  • Solve complex problems with strong attention to detail.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and demonstrate strong interpersonal skills.
  • Make informed decisions on software solutions.
  • Gather technical requirements and translate them into scalable solutions.
  • Approve and deploy code changes with confidence.
  • Assess and troubleshoot software issues efficiently.
  • Create and maintain software development best practices.

Requirements

About you

  • At least 5 years of experience in backend software development  
  • Experience with writing well-tested and high-quality code  
  • Experience with Python & Typescript - additional experience with Golang is a plus 
  • Experience with message brokers e.g. with RabbitMQ or others 
  • Experience with Machine Learning Theory e.g. SVMs, Neural Networks and LLMs
  • Experience with Natural Language Processing (NLP) - essential text processing algorithms such as tokenization, part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition is a plus
  • Experience with Natural Language Understanding (NLU) such as extracting meaning and intent detection is a plus
  • Experience with Kubernetes and ideally familiar with writing Helm charts - additional experience with deployment of NLP Models e.g. with NVIDIA Triton Inference Server is a plus 
  • Familiar with multiple databases such as MongoDB and Redis  
  • Familiar with monitoring tools such as Prometheus and Grafana 
  • Open to various programming languages and willing to learn continuously 
  • Passionate about sharing best approaches  

Benefits

Life at Cognigy - What we offer you

We are an ambitious and international tech company with a great culture, and we make sure that everyone feels welcome. Our excellent benefits make us a fantastic place to work - these include

  • Attractive and performance-oriented salary
  • Company Pension Scheme
  • 25 days paid leave, plus 5 floating days, plus public holidays
  • Unique opportunity to help build and shape the company, with little hierarchy
  • Flexible working options
  • Colleague recognition, reward and celebration events
  • Global Employee Assistance Program
  • ClassPass membership, giving you access to a variety of fitness and wellness experiences
  • Ongoing learning and development opportunities, including LinkedIn Learning
  • One paid ‘Giving Back Day' each year, so you can volunteer for a charity or community activity of your choice
  • Subscription to the Calm app for you plus five friends/family members, giving you access to guided meditation, sleep stories, music, masterclasses, and much more

Equal Opportunity Employer Statement - Cognigy does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, age, national origin, marital status, disability, veteran status, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law in provision of employment opportunities and benefits.
